title: TASK_PAUSE
content:
0xE73A266DB0CA90420x17A64668// TaskPause
void TASK_PAUSE(Ped ped, int ms);Parameters:ped: The ped to pause. Set to this 0 when using task sequences.ms: The amount of miliseconds to wait.This tasks the ped to do nothing for the specified amount of miliseconds.
This is useful if you want to add a delay between tasks when using a sequence task.
codeBlocks:
// TaskPause
void TASK_PAUSE(Ped ped, int ms);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for TASK_PAUSE
TaskPause(ped, 0)
